Phrases.BuyLevel: Denne bane koster 20 orbs. Du kan samle dem inde i spillet eller købe dem i shoppen.
Phrases.CouldNotLoadDatabaseReinstall: Kunne ikke hente data fra Databasen. Du skal geninstallere spillet fra Play Store
Phrases.LastLevelInfo: Du er nået til den sidste bane i spillet....indtil videre. Tjek tilbage snart for flere baner.

Root.CreditsList:
Holdet bag: Simon Bentzen, Game Designer Nicholas Bukdahl, Level Designer Ivan Dimov, Lead Programmer Dennis Godtfredsen, QA & UX Manager Nadia Hamza, CG Artist Majbritt Løfgreen, Audio Designer Klaus Tue Madsen, Game Director Rosen Milev, CG Artist Tomas Gislason Moesgaard, QA Programmer Steffen Nygaard, QA & UX Manager Bo Jack Olrik Olsen, Programmer Amanda Natalie Rasmussen, Project Manager Peter Troelsen, Programmer Anders Wessberg, Programmer Veselin Yanakiev, Pipeline Programmer Julie Tidsvilde Zintel, Art Director
Ekstern hjælp: Jeppe Bisbjerg, Kiloo Sofie Møller Dybro, Business Developer Thomas Howalt, Teacher at DADIU Hissu Hyvärinen, Linguistics and Informatics Consultant Søren S. Kammer, Business Developer Simon Løvind, The Danish Film Institute Mette Mathiasen, Business Developer Christian Westergaard Nielsen, Business Developer Line Bøgh Rasmussen, Business Developer Rene Skov Simonsen, Business Developer Kirstine Skytte, Nice Ninja Denis Virlogeux, KADK Gunnar Wille, Head of DADIU
QA og UX Managers: Philip Kroer Færch Philip Hargett Kasper Urban Kajgaard Andrea Keiser Benjamin Legarth Nicolaj Lykkegaard Mads Hagemann Nielsen Philip Hundevad Nymann Emily Skjøttgaard Smith Lasse von Fintel Sostack Jens Beyer Østergaard
Testere: Kristian Ahm Christian Anberg Alexander Arendttorp Christoffer Bech Andreas Birnbaum Boel Danielsen Frederik Bitzer Stig Bjørn Mille Krogh Carlsen Rasmus Bøgelund Christiansen Maria Cole Vlad Epure Mikkel Eskildsen Lise­Lotte Evensen Stine Gjering Frederiksen Simon Frisendahl Thor Hansen Dennis Holm Hansen Karoline Amalie Sandfeld Hansen Mads Hemdrup Julie Hindkjær Mette Jakobsen Micaela Kühn Jara Annika Krag Frederik Knudsen
Gratis software: Mixamo FontForge Jenkins
En særlig tak til: Malling SFO Vibenhus Skole Christoffer Wadum Larsen SpilBar DADIU’s personale

hints.stay: If you tell a dog to sit it ***** put
hints.lever: Træk i den og noget aktiveres
hints.stick: Den er brun, og man kan sætte ild til den
hints.font: It can contain several buckets of water, looks like a birdbath
hints.pool: An endless supply of water at your disposal!
hints.key: It’s tiny, it’s shiny.. but it’s the only means to get out!
hints.door: Can be opened with a certain shiny little object.
hints.bucket: Can be used to transport fluids.
